attributes.action: Retired  props to referee international scrums
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to prevent any more egregious referring errors such as those witnessed five times on Saturday 21 October at the Rugby World Cup
attributes.background:
The British Government to lobby World Rugby to require a retired international prop (>30 caps) to be added to as an additional match official.

The retired prop would saunter onto the pitch when scrums are formed and act as a specialist scrum referee

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about rugby officiation are a matter for World Rugby, not the UK Government or Parliament.
